changeSet.author: irazin
changeSet.comment: Remove Transplant Type and add Most recent clinical note attached fields
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`rmcasefileinfo` DROP COLUMN `hastransplanttype`; ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`rmcasefileinfo` ADD COLUMN `has_clinic_note_or_report` BIT(1) DEFAULT NULL;
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`rmcasefileinfo` ADD COLUMN `hastransplanttype` BIT(1) DEFAULT NULL; ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`rmcasefileinfo` DROP COLUMN `has_clinic_note_or_report`;
